section.p: Data collected about tissue concentrations of anylytes( usually study drugs and/or their metabolites) as a function of time after dosing the study drug.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the pharmacokinetics result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: PCTESTCD, PCTEST]

SHALL contain [1..3] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the pharacokinetics result. [SDTM: PCSEQ, PCREFID, PCSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: PCSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type CD
The pharmacokinetics result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. [SDTM: PCORRES, PCORRESU, PCSTRESC, PCSTRESN, PCSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: PCMETHOD]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the finding is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] pharmacokineticsTestResultCategory with data type pharmacokinetics Test Result Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the finding is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] pharmacokineticsTestResultSubCategory with data type pharmacokinetics Test Result Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether or not the study subject was fasting at the time of specimen collection.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)
The code value indicates the observation concerns the subject's fasting status.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BN
Information on whether the person was fasting at the time the specimen was collected. [SDTM: LBFAST]

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to capture information about the specimen used as the direct subject of the test.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.67)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] study Test Performer
Used to record the organization performing the test.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Performer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.73)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether or not a data value has derived frrom the results of other tests or inquiries.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived Data Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.60)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to record the lower limit of quantitation for an assay.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] typeId
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="DEF" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)
The code value identifies this as an asssay quantitation observation.
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type IVL_PQ
Captures the lower limit of assay quantitation. Value as the low property of the IVL data type. The units of measure are expected to match those designated as the standard units for the result. [SDTM: PCLLOQ]
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain [1..3] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the pharacokinetics result. [SDTM: PCSEQ, PCREFID, PCSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the pharmacokinetics result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: PCTESTCD, PCTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: PCSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type CD
The pharmacokinetics result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. [SDTM: PCORRES, PCORRESU, PCSTRESC, PCSTRESN, PCSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: PCMETHOD]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the finding is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] pharmacokineticsTestResultCategory with data type pharmacokinetics Test Result Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the finding is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] pharmacokineticsTestResultSubCategory with data type pharmacokinetics Test Result Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether or not the study subject was fasting at the time of specimen collection.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BN
Information on whether the person was fasting at the time the specimen was collected. [SDTM: LBFAST]

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.67)
Used to capture information about the specimen used as the direct subject of the test.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship

This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] typeId
